# PoolIdLibrary
[Git Source](https://gitlab.com/nomadhub/smart-contracts/blob/e023936db04d0b7e2f5bfdf55b2bcf9f827cb12c/contracts/v2/external/@pancakeswap/infinity-core/src/types/PoolId.sol)

Library for computing the ID of a pool


## Functions
### toId


```solidity
function toId(PoolKey memory poolKey) internal pure returns (PoolId poolId);
```
